name: workaday
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
ordinary; not unusual: Compared to the extravagance and glamour of last winter's clothes, this season's collection look simple, almost workaday. an escape from the workaday world Synonyms
everyday
mundane
quotidian formal
unremarkable
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
being part of normal life and not specialordinaryHe took ordinary household objects and transformed them into pieces of art. everydayComputers are now just a part of everyday life.quotidianWe longed for the quotidian rituals, like shopping and tea, that the end of the war would bring.day-to-dayDay-to-day operations of the team would be handled by the assistant coach.dailyI'm looking for a good daily shampoo that won't damage my hair.
